title: Studio 10's Sarah Harris shares comparison photos of herself before and after makeup
text:
Sarah Harris has revealed what a difference a good hair and makeup artist can make.

Taking to Instagram on Friday, the 38-year-old Studio 10 host shared stunning comparison photos of herself before and after getting her makeup applied.

'REALITY VS TV READY,' she captioned the photos, revealing she had been made over by hair and makeup artist Renee Wanna, who Sarah described as a 'magician'.

Before and after: Sarah Harris took to Instagram on Friday to share stunning comparison photos of herself before and after getting her makeup applied

In the before photo, Sarah can be seen squinting at the camera, her wet hair pulled back, and her bare skin appearing on the reddish side.

The after photo shows her bobbed blonde hair styled into tousled waves, while her skin appears smooth, and her eyes have been accentuated.

In an interview with 10 daily on Friday, Renee revealed the secrets to achieving Sarah's stunning look.

'REALITY VS TV READY,' she captioned the photos, revealing she had been made over by hair and makeup artist Renee Wanna (right), who Sarah described as a 'magician'

She said hydration was the key to good skin, and implored people to exfoliate the night before a big event and always apply moisturiser before makeup.

And to achieve a glow, Renee recommended using a cream blush before layering a powder blush over the top.

Sarah regularly pokes fun at herself on her Instagram, sharing before and after photos of herself.

Having a laugh: Sarah regularly pokes fun at herself on her Instagram, sharing before and after photos of herself

In August, she shared a selfie of herself posing chicly, while a second photo showed her clumsily applying lipstick.

'Instagram vs reality,' she captioned the photos.

In an interview with Good Health & Wellbeing in December, Sarah said she enjoyed just 'vegging out' when she's not at work.

Take it easy: In an interview with Good Health & Wellbeing in December, Sarah said she enjoyed just 'vegging out' when she's not at work

'I think 'me-time' is so important, and I don't mean going for massages or facials, because that's bloody expensive and not realistic,' she said.

And she confessed when she's not at work, she doesn't spend much time on her appearance.

'I'm so much happier out of makeup, bra off, and at home on the couch. That's nourishing the soul for me!' she added.
description: Sarah Harris has revealed what a difference a good hair and makeup artist can make. Taking to Instagram on Friday, the 38-year-old Studio 10 host shared stunning comparison photos of herself.
authors: Demeter Stamell For Daily Mail Australia
